info.title: Poolside Challenge API
info.description: API to manage interview schedule availability and interview appointments

get.summary: Returns configured availability for a given month.

parameters.name: startdate
parameters.description: The beginning date and time of the availability range.

parameters.name: enddate
parameters.description: The end date and time of the availability range.

200.description: A JSON array of availability objects

availabilityDate.description: The date and time of the start of the availability slot

duration.description: Duration of the availability slot in minutes.

400.description: A Bad Request response when either the startdate or enddate parameters are missing, or if the end date is not after the start date..
